testsuite.name: com.bookstore.usermanagement.service.UserServiceTest

testcase.name: getUser should return user when found()
getUser should throw exception when user not found()
getAllUsers should return list of usernames()
updateUser should throw exception when new username already exists()
deleteUser should delete existing user successfully()
deleteUser should throw exception when user not found()
addUser should throw exception when username already exists()
addUser should create new user successfully()
updateUser should update existing user successfully()
updateUser should throw exception when user not found()
